caption.center: BERNARD K.B. LUM, and HESTER T. LUM, Movants-Appellees, v. LEE D.
DONOHUE, Chief of Police, City and County of Honolulu,
AND. GEORGE GRACE, III, dba COMMERCIAL EQUIPMENT SERVICES,
Movant-Appellant, v. LEE D. DONOHUE, Chief of Police, City
and County of Honolulu, Respondent-Appellee, and FIRST
INSURANCE COMPANY OF HAWAII, LTD., Intervenor-Appellee

court.center: Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawaii.

opinion.opinion_byline: BURNS, C.J., LIM AND FOLEY, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
The opinion of the court, filed on April 30, 2003, is amended as follows (deletion is bracketed and addition is underscored):
The portion of the caption which reads [v. LEE DONAHUE] is amended to read v. LEE DONOHUE.
The Clerk of the Court is hereby directed to incorporate the foregoing changes in the original opinion.
